title: Games We Play
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 45 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 30L
description: The children in this book enjoy all kinds of familiar activities, from sports to dress-up to video games. The end of the book provides an important safety lesson. Fun illustrations accompany patterned text and changing vocabulary.
meta: baseball, dress-up, hide-and-seek, play, soccer, video games
